code: import React,{useState}from"react";import logo from"../assets/images/vrv.jpg";import"../assets/Styles/TopBar.css";import{FaBell,FaQuestionCircle,FaUserCircle,FaChevronDown,FaCog}from"react-icons/fa";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TopBar=()=>{const[isDropdownOpen,setIsDropdownOpen]=useState(false);const toggleDropdown=()=>{setIsDropdownOpen(!isDropdownOpen);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"top-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-bar-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaBell,{className:"icon",title:"Notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCog,{className:"icon",title:"Settings"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaQuestionCircle,{className:"icon",title:"Help"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-dropdown",onClick:toggleDropdown,onBlur:()=>setIsDropdownOpen(false),tabIndex:"0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaUserCircle,{className:"icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Admin"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaChevronDown,{className:`dropdown-icon ${isDropdownOpen?"rotate":""}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:`dropdown-menu ${isDropdownOpen?"show":""}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Logout"})})]})]})]});};export default TopBar;
